ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.
ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

Application.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update a managed application.

Application2.description: Parameters supplied to update an existing managed application.

kind.description: The kind of the managed application. Allowed values are MarketPlace and ServiceCatalog.

uri.description: The managed application artifact blob uri.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

value.description: The array of managed application definitions.

artifacts.description: The collection of managed application artifacts. The portal will use the files specified as artifacts to construct the user experience of creating a managed application from a managed application definition.

createUiDefinition.description: The createUiDefinition json for the backing template with Microsoft.Solutions/applications resource. It can be a JObject or well-formed JSON string.

displayName.description: The managed application definition display name.

isEnabled.description: A value indicating whether the package is enabled or not.

mainTemplate.description: The inline main template json which has resources to be provisioned. It can be a JObject or well-formed JSON string.

packageFileUri.description: The managed application definition package file Uri. Use this element

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

kind.description: The kind of the managed application. Allowed values are MarketPlace and ServiceCatalog.

parameters.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application parameters. It can be a JObject or a well formed JSON string.

applicationDefinitionId.description: The fully qualified path of managed application definition Id.

outputs.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application outputs.

uiDefinitionUri.description: The blob URI where the UI definition file is located.

parameters.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application parameters. It can be a JObject or a well formed JSON string.

applicationDefinitionId.description: The fully qualified path of managed application definition Id.

outputs.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application outputs.

uiDefinitionUri.description: The blob URI where the UI definition file is located.

principalId.description: The provider's principal identifier. This is the identity that the provider will use to call ARM to manage the managed application resources.

roleDefinitionId.description: The provider's role definition identifier. This role will define all the permissions that the provider must have on the managed application's container resource group. This role definition cannot have permission to delete the resource group.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates managed application is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

errorMessage.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

managedBy.description: ID of the resource that manages this resource.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning status of the managed application.
